name: Void Cube Runner
description:
Important!this game is for skill-based game lovers.
If you do not like skill-based games, we do not recommend you play.WHAT IS VCR?
  • Skill based runner game
  • Feel music
  • Show yourself in leaderboard
  • Be best

If you like infinity running games. Try this out. You have to realize that you are getting better every time. This game will encouragement you to play again each time.

At first you might feel it hard, but every time you try. You're gonna develop.

In the game beginning you'll see random cubes in void. You can do wall run or jump from cubes. This game's logic is simple.ACTUALLY WHAT IS VCR?Reflex, talent and prediction necessary game. The longer you go, the more you will have fun. The longer you go, the more you will improve.
